transcript: we'll just call him Logan it's a young guy ambitious is started listening to some of my stuff went to another guy who was a little bit older and then tried to learn the basics of editing video Logan went to the business used the buddy who taught him a little bit about editing to get a job interview and he' learned enough that he could get a job offer he gets a $60,000 offer which a solid amount of money for editing with basically no experience just from the small amount of skills he was able to learn rather than accept the job he asked for $3,000 more because because what he thought he had to do was earn rather than learn who cares the business is obviously not going to do that
